Port Not Accessible

Your port cannot be reached from the internet. Other nodes won't be able to connect to you.

  1. Open your router settings (usually 192.168.1.1)
  2. Find Port Forwarding settings
  3. Forward external 20049 to internal 20049 (UDP)
  4. Allow port 20049 in your firewall
